properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued February 5 at 3:07PM EST until February 6 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Monroe County.

* WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the
lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast winds will increase to 20 mph
this evening with gusts to 25 mph. This will lead to increased
lake levels across the western basin of Lake Erie. Water levels
at Fermi are forecast to reach 63 inches above low water datum
tonight, then gradually fall Thursday morning as winds shift
more to the north.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST THURSDAY
